name: Nico Limbara
summary: Detail-oriented Software Engineer with over 5 years experience and a demonstrated history of working in startup enviroment. Always eager to learn new things to keep up to date with the tech industry. Currently doing a bit of problem solving on Leetcode and focused on learning Golang, I'm open to learn to new tech skill to support my career.
